properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') AS CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' = ', item().CALMONTH)

preCopyScript.value:
delete from cd_ods.neis_meals_new  		
where YYYYMM = '@{item().calmonth}'

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

preCopyScript.value: DELETE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}
DELETE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}_temp

query.value:
INSERT INTO @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}
(
 order_detail_id          
  ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
)
SELECT order_detail_id          
    ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}_TEMP
WHERE bidid NOT IN ( SELECT distinct bidid from @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable} );

select 1 as ss;

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('truncate table ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,';')}

properties.description: - 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('truncate table ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,';')}

delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
                 and  to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '0 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday  between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' ), 'YYYYMMDD')
                  and to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' + interval '1 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성(Copy Activity Sink에서 precopy script로 적용)

- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Current Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O00000_FULL
 WHERE CALMONTH BETWEEN '201907' AND '201912'
@concat('SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),''MM''),''YYYYMMDD'') AS SDATE, TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),''YYYYMMDD'')   AS EDATE FROM DUAL ')
@concat('SELECT CALDAY, MATERIAL, ZAMT, ZBOX FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,' WHERE CALDAY BETWEEN ''',item().SDATE,''' AND ''', item().EDATE,'''')

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('DELETE FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,' WHERE CALDAY BETWEEN ''', item().SDATE, ''' AND ''',item().EDATE,'''')}
@{concat('truncate table ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,';')}

properties.description: - 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('truncate table ',pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable,';')}

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours')::date-1, 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours'), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' + interval '1 months')::date - 1, 'YYYYMMDD');

- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성(Copy Activity Sink에서 precopy script로 적용)

- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

- Copy data Previous Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date)::date-1, 'YYYYMMDD');

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O06100
 WHERE CALDAY >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND CALDAY <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o06100 
where calday >= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date), 'YYYYMMDD')
and calday <= to_char(date_trunc('month', current_date + interval '1 months')::date - 1, 'YYYYMMDD');
